articles.author: Catherine Shoichet, CNN
articles.title: New York Bronx fire a 'shock in our country' Gambia ambassador says - CNN
articles.description: The Bronx apartment building that was devastated by a deadly fire Sunday had been a beloved home for many immigrants from The Gambia for years, the West African country's ambassador to the US told CNN.
